name: Shielta: Veil of Stars
description:
Features

  • Shared Story: Two main characters, two stories. Experience the story of Shielta from your own unique perspective while playing together with a friend.



  • Ruthless and tactical combat: The world of Shielta is a ruthless place that will not hold your hand. Inspired by the tough and rewarding combat of the Souls series, Shielta will require you to balance offense and defense, use crafty tactics and work together to survive. But beware, enemies will also team up and use clever tactics against you.



  • Harness devastating magic creatively: Powerful spells can help you turn the tides in battle, but use them ingeniously. Freeze burning fires, fling rushing enemies into spikes or disarm archers – the choice is yours.



  • Made for co-op: Everything in Shielta is designed for exactly two players. Heal and buff each other, carve through enemies with brutal co-op combos, and combine your spells to unleash devastating effects.



  • Massive boss fights: Every boss is an awe-inspiring fight with new mechanics to overcome. Coordinate your actions and sharpen your wits – combat prowess alone won’t help you.



  • A vast and dark fantasy world: Explore Talendil, a land divided between four military factions and controlled by the two remaining gods, Elieth and Zargoth. Climb, vault and adventure through the non-linear levels of Shielta full of perils and mysteries to discover.



  • Cryptic puzzles: Inspired by the co-op mode in Portal 2, every puzzle requires the two characters’ unique abilities and close communication to solve. Your efforts won’t go in vain, as the rewards will be worth it.



  • Improve and customize your character: Develop your skills, power up and customize your spells, and fine-tune your playstyle. You can specialize in more supportive, defensive or offensive capabilities as you see fit.
